name: CardinalsFan

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cardinals fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Cardinals by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Cardinals.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Cardinals Fan how are the Cardinals doing? 

Alexa, ask Cardinals Fan who do the Cardinals play next?

Alexa, ask Cardinals Fan Larry Fitzgerald (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Cardinals:


Alexa, ask Cardinals Fan to tell me some trivia about the Cardinals. 

Alexa, ask Cardinals Fan how many Super Bowls have the Cardinals won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
